name: Mt. Washington
description: New for the 2024-25 Season. Relish in the authentic West Coast vibe, where the clock ticks a little slower. Island time radiates throughout the happy, laid-back Mt. Washington locals who prosper in the bounty of fresh local fair, beautiful climate, and an endless coastal playground, year-round. The true seasonal magic you're looking for is all right here. Please Note: Mt. Washington has joined for the 24/25 Season. Current Indy Passholders may NOT use their Indy Passes here until next season.
